first_para: Lee Scott (born 6 April 1956) is a British politician. He is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Ilford North, and an officer of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.

full.extract: Lee Scott (born 6 April 1956) is a British politician. He is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Ilford North, and an officer of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.
full.title: Lee Scott (politician)
